DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized study evaluate dose frequency gonadotropin administration ART cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Once Daily v Twice Daily Administration Gonadotropins Assisted Reproductive Technologies ( ART )
DOC.detailed_description: Using daily bid dose gonadotropin ART arbitrary study show whether split medication dose improve ART parameter . This study undertaken provide answer important question .
DOC.criteria: woman < 40 undergoing ART woman > 40 endometriomas severe cervical stenosis testicular sperm
